data.title: What streaming apps are on Virgin TV? Netflix, All 4, BBC iPlayer and more
data.meta_description: All the information on what TV apps you can find on Virgin TV, no matter what TV box you have.
data.text:
If the smorgasbord of TV channels can’t fulfil your insatiable urge for top-notch telly, then for you lucky Virgin Media customers armed with a V6 box, powered by TiVo®, or a Virgin TV 360 box there’s a plethora of apps offering oodles more content for you to feast your eyes on.

We’re adding brand new apps to our service all the time. What does that mean? It means you can watch even more of your favourite shows when you want.

With Box Sets, films, games and activities that keep the whole family entertained, there’s plenty of apps to choose from. To find them on your V6 box, simply head on over to Home > Apps & Games > All Apps, and get watching. TV 360 customers can press Home > Apps, or use voice control and just say “apps”.

Virgin Media Store: For those who just can’t wait

Check out the Virgin Media Store

Buy and keep the biggest blockbusters around before they are available to rent, plus pre-order the year’s biggest cinematic releases thanks to the Virgin Media Store.

And if you want to get your hands on the most talked-about TV Box Sets, like Game Of Thrones and Westworld, then we can be of assistance. With the store app you can watch your purchases on your Virgin TV and even download them to watch offline and on the go. Sign up now.

Download the Virgin Media Store app from the Apple app store

Download the Virgin Media Store app from Google Play

There are even more apps waiting for you. Thinking about upgrading your Virgin TV account? You can do that via the TV Upgrades app. With the Radioline app you get access to 70,000 radio stations from across the world. There’s also the Get Fit Today app, which hosts a variety of at-home exercises to boost your health and mood. And you can get your music video fix thanks to Vevo.

Finding them is easy, simply:

• Press Home on your remote

• Select Apps & Games

• Select All Apps

Check out the full list of the awesome apps you can enjoy below.

If you find an app you really like, here is how to add it to your favourites…

• Highlight the app in Apps & Games

• Press Thumbs Up to add it as a favourite.

If you change your mind, you can remove it as a favourite app by pressing Thumbs Down instead.

So what are you waiting for? Get app to speed!

Separate terms and conditions apply to the Virgin Media Store service. DVD included for movie purchases only. Purchases must be made on the website or set top box. Virgin TV subscription and our latest Virgin TV V6 box required to buy and watch via set top box – Store is not available on other boxes. Compatible device & browser required. Max 5 registered devices. Max 2 devices can stream content simultaneously. Stream and download in UK only (or while temporarily in the EU).
